message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the potential it holds, I propose a price of $12000 for the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $9000?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to consider a compromise at a price of $10500 for the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget constraints, could we possibly agree on a price of $9500 for the product?
I appreciate your efforts to stay within your budget, Bob. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to offer it to you for $10000.
